runs.comm: length delivery, not much swing on this one, it keeps going away with the angle, Tamim leaves it alone
he gives him the charge straightaway and gets a thick outside edge.. Tamim is lucky as it just flies over the second slip fielder..
he tucks this back of length delivery to square leg for an easy single
beautifully punched off the back foot! He just stands tall and whacks the back of length delivery through cover, stands nice and straight and balanced..
length delivery on the stumps, the batsman defends it to midwicket off the back foot
on the pads and now he picks another boundary! Supple wrists they say, that's what makes this short so sweet.. Just a neat flick and it races to the deep square leg boundary
gets very good bounce from a flatter delivery, punched to cover point
fires this one in, the batsman comes forward and pushes it back to the bowler
slower this time, the batsman dabs it to the leg side and calls for a quick single. Dhoni makes a run for it, but both batsmen make it well in time
flatter and on the off stump line, Bijoy goes back and tucks it behind square on the leg side for an easy single
slower and on off stump, the batsman comes forward and defends it to the leg side
gets some drift on the pads, the batsman flicks it straight to the fielder at square leg

Dhawan gives a big big life to Tamim! This is outrageous from the fielder, he misses a chance to run out Tamim from a close range. The batsman pushed it towards mid-on, but Tamim set off immediately..Dhawan had all the time to hit the stumps as Tamim had give up completely.. He misses
stands tall and defends the back of length ball to cover
he played one of these in the last over and one again now.. short and wide, the batsman stands tall and frees his arms, smacking it through cover
fuller delivery on the stumps, the batsman pushes it to Dhawan at mid-on.. Tamim was again looking for a single which is not there
that's one sharp bouncer! The batsman looks to hook it but that was too quick for him. That's also called a wide now
he has played two good shots but now goes for a rash one! Tries to send this over deep midwicket but the length is not there for that shot.. It goes over the top of off
he stays in the crease and defends the length delivery towards cover point
flatter and on off stump, the batsman goes back and punches it to mid off

caught at slip! Tamim doesn't make much of his life.. Ashwin tosses this one up nicely. It is slow, dips and bites the surface to turn a touch. The batsman comes forward to push it to off and gets a thick outside edge that Raina pouches safely.. The umpires were not sure if that was taken cleanly as this was a low catch, but Tamim started walking straightaway

make it two in two! What are you doing Shamsur! He has just come in but looks to send this into the stands..Goes down on his knee and plays a sweep in the air, but there is man placed at deep square leg exactly for that shot. He doesn't have to move an inch as it flies straight to him.. What a disastrous shot to play when you are making a comeback into the side
full and on the pads, it's neatly tucked to square leg for a single
slower and tossed up, the batsman has to wait before defending it to midwicket
a bit of drift for the bowler, the batsman comes a touch forward and defends

and he strikes first ball! Shakib is gone now.. It's not a bowler's wicket this one.. Bangladesh needed their best batsman to be there, but all he does is he walks down the pitch but plays a shot of no intent. It's neither a defensive push, nor aggressive.. the ball deviates just enough to get the inside edge on to his pads before it rolls into the stumps..
fuller and wider, swings it away a touch too. The batsman chases the delivery and is beaten
back of length delivery on off, Mushy stands tall ironically and defends it down the pitch
this one comes in a touch, the batsman waits a little and opens the face to dab it towards gully for a single
nice slower delivery from Bhuvi! It's a legcutter and it beats the outside edge
back of length delivery on off, the batsman stays in the crease and defends it to mid on
tossed up delivery on off, the batsman comes forward and pushes it to midwicket
full and flighted outside off, the batsman pushes it to wide mid off for a single
he manages to chip it over extra cover and finds the boundary! Not the most convincing inside out shot, but he gets enough bat on that to beat the infield.
comes forward and defends it to midwicket
slower and loopy on the middle stump, the batsman comes forward and defends
another tight delivery on off, it's tossed up and slower, Anamul stays patient and defends
lots of air on this one, it's almost a yorker, the batsman digs it out to cover
slower and flighted, Mushy comes forward and drives it down to long off for an easy single
fuller on the pads, the batsman looks to deflect it to the leg side, but gets a leading edge towards cover
he takes a forward step and eases it to long on for a single
he is lucky here! Anamul charges down the pitch but Jadeja drops it short this time.. Anamul wasn't backing away from his shot -  he swings hard and gets a thick outside edge through gully
fuller on the pads, nicely tucked away to deep midwicket for a single
tossed up on off, the batsman drives it back to the bowler
wants to play a big shot again, but doesn't get hold of it. He charges down and hits this to deep midwicket off the inside half of the bat
short and gets what it deserved. Mushy goes deep in his crease and pulls it powerfully to deep square leg boundary
on the pads, it's easily nudged to backward square leg for an easy single
tossed up delivery on off, Anamul eases this to long on for a single
he goes deep in his crease and dabs this to midwicket for a single
fuller and on the stumps, the batsman defends it down the pitch
another outside edge brings a boundary! The batsman was out of the crease and looks to launch it over cover, but gets a thick edge through gully
his favourite slog sweep and he plays it well! Mushy picks this from wide outside off and smashes it in the gap at deep midwicket
almost carries back to the bowler! The batsman looks to flick it to the leg side but gets a leading edge down the pitch
fuller on off, he drives it straight to cover
flatter delivery this time, the batsman chops it straight to point
on the pads, the batsman flicks it to square leg for an easy single.. Dhoni chases that one
flatter on off, the batsman goes back and works it away to the leg side for a single
fuller and quicker on the middle, the batsman flicks it with ease to deep square leg for a single
bowls this from wide of the crease but there is no turn at the moment, the batsman nudges it through square leg for a single
lots of loop and lots of turn! This zips past the outside edge
he removed the slip fielder before this ball and the batsman gets an outside edge through that region as he pushes at a quicker delivery
the batsman gives Shami a charge, but gets an inside edge to midwicket
back of length delivery on off, the batsman gets right behind the line and defends it down the pitch
What. A. Shot. That. is! First six for Bangladesh.. He moves out of the crease smoothly, creates room and whips it over extra cover.. That is a stylish shot for a six..It's a big one too
on the pads, the batsman misses his flick shot, the ball hits the pads and rolls to the leg side

short and it comes gift wrapped with width! Mushy is not going to miss out on those.. He waits and cuts it off the back foot through backward point.. For a short man, that is one nicely controlled shot. He got on top of the bounce nicely

another poor shot from a Bangladesh batsman! They had already had a six and a four from this over, but Mushy becomes over-ambitious. He tries to pull a length delivery from outside off to deep midwicket, doesn't get it on the middle and it lobs tamely towards midwicket where Kohli takes an easy chance to his left..
tossed up on the stumps, the batsman pushes it softly towards mid-on for a single.. Jadeja could have stopped it twice, but it kept going away from him
fuller outside off, easily pushed to long on for a single
opens the face of the bat to place it to the right of short third man, looks for a single, but Nasir turns it down
another superb shot from Anamul! he makes a little room and launches it over extra cover.. It keeps sailing all the way.. He has played this shot three times.. Beautifully done
he comes forward and defends it solidly down the pitch
intelligent batting, fuller on the stumps, he flicks it easily to deep midwicket to keep the strike
flatter and outside off, this is good running as Bijoy pushes it softly towards wide long off and takes on Dhawan's arm, comes back comfortably
slow and flighted on off, this one grips the surface and turns away, but the batsman plays a good defensive shot to point
this is through everyone! It was a quicker delivery outside off and the batsman looked to turn it away to the leg, misses it, so does Dhoni
waits for the ball to turn, then punches it straight to cover
fuller and flighted on off, the batsman pushes it down the pitch

gets him with a big googly! Anamul probably read it right but didn't anticipate the big turn.. This was flatter and wide outside off, cuts in after pitching and strikes the top of off. The batsman was looking to nudge it away to the leg side. No he didn't pick it..
flatter on off, the batsman stays back and punches it to long on for a single
flatter delivery on the stumps, defended to the leg side
it's nudged straight to midwicket again, still no run
tossed up delivery on off, the batsman pushes it down to long on
flatter and on off, the batsman goes back and works it away to deep square leg
fuller and flighted, the batsman pushes it with the turn to midwicket
he steps out of the crease and pushes the fuller delivery to extra cover for a single
short and wide, he misses out on some runs as he cracks this straight to point

this could be more trouble for Bangladesh! The batsman is beaten by a slower delivery that just turns past the outside edge.. But the replays show he has his back foot grounded behind the crease. A touch slower from Jadeja this one
fuller, almost a yorker outside off, the batsman digs it out to cover point
wider outside off and this is a handsome shot form Mahmudullah! He stretches forward, accounts for the turn and drives it through cover point brilliantly
quicker delivery on the stumps, the batsman pushes it back down the pitch
slower on off, the batsman pushes it back down the pitch, can't beat Ashwin
allows this to turn, then chops it to gully for an easy single
he fires it flat and short on the leg side, the batsman misses his flick but picks up a leg bye to short fine leg
slower outside off, the batsman waits, then punches it to deep extra cover
poor delivery! It's full and down the leg side.. Mahmudullah sweeps it well to beat the short fine leg fielder..
tries the carrom ball, but the batsman reads it well to dab it to square leg for a single
Whoa! Flat six over deep midwicket.. It was tossed up, it was full outside off, but the batsman gets under it nicely and powers it out of the playing area.. Big strike
allows this one to turn away, then dabs it to cover for a quick single
lots of air and some turn away from the bat, but the batsman reaches it and pushes it to cover
comes out of the crease and drives this fuller delivery to extra cover, all along the ground
he finds the gap at backward point! Pin-point precision from the batsman.. he watches the ball turn, then whacks it between the fielders
tries to reverse paddle it fine, but that pitches and keeps turning away from the batsman.. He doesn't get a bat on it and is disappointed with the choice
solid strike over extra cover! He gets under this fuller delivery and hammers it over the infield, Jadeja from long off runs around and does well to prevent the boundary
back of length delivery on the stumps, squares up the batsman as he defends it to off, they take a quick single
wonderful hit! This is a half-volley outside off but Mahmudullah has his target worked out, he whacks it over midwicket and easily finds the boundary
goes for the yorker, but this is down the leg side
this one is a super yorker on leg stump, but Mahmudullah is the one smiling as he gets a faint inside edge, enough to beat the stumps and the diving keeper..
length delivery outside off, the batsman looks to defend it to off, but gets an inside edge to the vacant square leg region.. they come back for a second to loud cheers from the crowd
full and quick outside off, the batsman looks to thrash it down the ground, but hits it straight at the bowler
looks for a yorker but it's a low full toss outside off, Nasir just has to punch it in the gap, which he does.. He creams it through extra cover
a nice yorker outside off, the batsman looks to carve it behind point but makes no contact
a good leg cutter from Bhuvi! The batsman looks to launch it over the off side but is beaten by the little away movement
fuller delivery on off, the batsman is not able to get under it, drives it down the ground to long off
it's another low full toss on the middle stump, Mahmudllah whips it to deep midwicket for a single
slower delivery, but this is too short, allows the batsman to wait and punch it to deep cover for a single

completely beaten! By pace, by flight, by turn.. this is an action replay of the Samuels or the Shahzad wicket from previous nights... The batsman comes out of the crease to the flighted delivery, but it is bowled slow, it lands much shorter than the batsman expects, then turns a mile to beat the outside edge..

he is quickly going up the table! Tossed up and full outside off, the batsman looks to whack it over long off, but is not able to get under it.. ends up scooping an easy chance to Jadeja at long off..
he backs away to the leg side but misses the big legspinner.. it turns away a mile..
it's a low full toss, the batsman whips it to deep midwicket for a single
wow! So much air on this one..lures the batsman into a big heave, but he misses it completely as it turns past the edge
that's a great way to finish! This is too full and Mashrafe gets the right length to get under.. He is a powerful man, whacks it over deep midwicket easily
